name: The Source of All Evil
heading: null_s
description: Etna & Flonne's trial for the most powerful Overlord starts soon!

name: Overlord Cosplay
heading: null_s
description:
A mysterious voice came out of nowhere... 
Who was that?
And what's he up to!?

name: Hell's Kitchen
heading: null_s
description:
Laharl's transformation leads to an unpredictable 
turn of events...

name: Dark Hero's Sorrow
heading: null_s
description: Disgusted by her unreliable vassal, Girl Laharl decides to restore her former body on her own.

name: Storming the Dark Assembly
heading: null_s
description: With the very best bribe, Girl Laharl triumphantly heads to the Dark Assembly. But...

name: The Mischievous Academy
heading: null_s
description:
The next stage for training the most powerful Overlord 
takes us to the Evil Academy, where the values of good and evil are completely reversed...

name: Schoolhouse of Evil
heading: null_s
description: Having avoided expulsion at Mao's hands, life at the academy is finally about to begin. However...

name: Waste Incinerator
heading: null_s
description:
As the party attends class 
to become Delinquents, Mr. You-Know-Who stands in their way again!

name: Gold Mine of Desire
heading: null_s
description:
Today's lesson is on "Fundraising". 
What is Raspberyl's real purpose? She's definitely up to no good.

name: Fork of Destruction
heading: null_s
description: Finally, the ultimate class begins. Can the party graduate as true Delinquents?

name: Love is a War
heading: null_s
description:
What is power? What is love?
A bittersweet romantic comedy begins now! Please enjoy watching Love Revolution DISGAEA!

name: The Spirited Girl-in-Love
heading: null_s
description: Two girls suddenly show up to provide Rozalin with "love training" (?) in order to win back the runaway Adell. Heh!

name: Poisonous Swamp of Love
heading: null_s
description: In front of Rozalin is the trial of the poisonous swamp. In spite of her Status Ailment, she heads straight in along the rugged path of love!

name: Boiling Sea of Love
heading: null_s
description:
A girl in love will choose to risk her life. 
Giving up is not an option. 
Let the flames of love burn!

name: The Battlefield of Love
heading: null_s
description: After overcoming many challenges, Rozalin has become the warrior of love and is now heading to where Adell is waiting. But...?

name: Revolutionary Love Front
heading: null_s
description:
Adell has been freed, but Zenon has awakened.
Can the party save Rozalin...?

name: Snowy Road of Love
heading: null_s
description: The party is searching for the puppeteer behind the scenes when Mr. You-Know-Who shows up again...!!

name: Training Ground of Love
heading: null_s
description: After defeating the Dark Hero, Adell starts to search his memory for the truth.

name: Wretched Plain of Love
heading: null_s
description:
The true identity of the puppeteer turns out to be Former Archangel Vulcanus. 
What's he up to...?

name: Eternal Circuit of Love
heading: null_s
description:
Power is love and love is power.
Now, a trial for the love of two!!

name: Solving the Labyrinth
heading: null_s
description: Just as the permanence of love has been witnessed, news of a Prinny tragedy comes in... The Nether Detective stands forward...

name: The Monopoly
heading: null_s
description:
With clues concealed in a fog of confusion, another murder occurs. 
To save the Prinnies, a true Detective must emerge!

name: Sardine Fishery
heading: null_s
description: To unravel the truth behind the Prinny murders, the detective redoubles all efforts. But the barbarous crimes continue...

name: The Sad Crimson Moon
heading: null_s
description:
"Want to know whodunit?" 
A new character appears. 
Now the tide is turning.

name: The Sinful End
heading: null_s
description: The showdown, finally! In the name of the Prinny Instructor, here comes revenge!

name: Map of the Great War
heading: null_s
description:
In the words of the Seraph, a shocking truth is revealed... 
To save the world, the party must find the Five Original Overlords.

name: The Scorching Flame
heading: null_s
description: To revive the Five Original Overlords, Etna and her friends visit the Scorching Flame Netherworld. Will they accomplish their task...

name: Symbol of Awe
heading: null_s
description:
※※※Spoiler Alert※※※
The true identity of the Final Boss will be revealed here.

name: The Lost Haven
heading: null_s
description: 3 Original Overlords to go, but Killia seems to be distracted by something...

name: Claw Mark of the Tyrant
heading: null_s
description: Once again determined, Killia starts to tell of the epic animosity between him and his destined enemy, Tyrant Overlord Baal...

name: Sanctuary of the Fist
heading: null_s
description:
The one who shows up before Killia is Zeroken, his junior disciple.
Shocking sexy beam episode

name: Closed Heart
heading: null_s
description:
2 Original Overlords to go. 
For the battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal, Killia hurries forward with his friends. But...

name: Feast of Curry
heading: null_s
description:
Usalia and Seraphina just won't wake up.
What on earth happened to them...!?

name: The Battle of Fate
heading: null_s
description: All 5 Original Overlords have been awakened, but the dark solar meteor shower is coming. The one who comes to save the day appears. But who is this savior...

name: A Stage Staged
heading: null_s
description: The battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal has begun. Joy at forming the dream team is short-lived. Battle must continue.

name: Holy Puppet Show
heading: null_s
description: It's the final stage of Overlord training. Before the battle with the Final Boss can begin, a final trial awaits. However...

name: Tree of Stardust
heading: null_s
description:
The next opponent is Flonne, the warrior of love. 
But an accident happens on her long-awaited debut.

name: The Crossing
heading: null_s
description:
Flonne keeps transforming.
Her power of love that makes the impossible possible finally reveals itself!

name: Majin's Armory
heading: null_s
description: As the opponent of the final trial, Etna now stands in the way! And what is her true hidden power...

name: The Fateful Divide
heading: null_s
description: Completely exhausted in the final trial, Flonne and her friends are now targeted by evil hands...!

name: Indelible Scars
heading: null_s
description:
Laharl announced a gathering 
during Flonne and Etna's absence! 
There was no time for grief 
as new enemies were making their move.

name: Guidepost for the Lost
heading: null_s
description:
Let Valvatorez join and 
bring the brainwashed Prinnies 
back to normal.

name: Hero's Hunting Ground
heading: null_s
description:
It appeared as though the fuss with the Prinnies and the Red Moon 
was down to the Super Hero Aurum. 
However, an even greater evil 
was lurking behind.

name: Creeping Abyss
heading: null_s
description:
A powerful Prinny Bomb was created 
to devastate the world. 
The party sets out to the Red Moon 
to save the Prinnies and the world.

name: Beckoning Tragedy
heading: null_s
description:
The expansion of the Prinny Bomb 
was beyond expectation. 
What will Laharl and his friends do?

name: Realm of Absolute Darkness
heading: null_s
description:
The mastermind has finally been cornered. 
After all these trials and hardships, it's finally showtime!

name: The Tombstone of the Fool
heading: null_s
description:
Axel showed up to interfere yet again 
as Laharl's party was about to 
challenge the Final Boss. 
Something wasn't quite right about him...

name: Instantaneous Easter
heading: null_s
description:
With enough medicine for two in hand, the party hurried back to where Etna was. 
Finally, the rowdy times 
were about to return...

name: Imminent Death
heading: null_s
description:
Vulcanus, in the company of Fallen Celestial Hosts. 
But here comes the counterattack from 
an angry Etna!

name: The Great War Festival
heading: null_s
description:
The memories of all those battles 
keep coming back. 
What will become of the training of the strongest Overlord 
and the final battle...

name: Gate of EXP
heading: null_s
description: null_s

name: Gate of HL
heading: null_s
description: null_s

name: Gate of Gems (Hum.)
heading: null_s
description: null_s

heading: null_s

heading: EP 1

heading: EP 3

heading: EP 4

heading: EP 5

heading: EP 6

heading: EP 7

heading: EP 8

name: Gordon the Defender
heading: EP 9
description: null_s

name: Angels, Demons, Humans
heading: EP 10
description: null_s

name: Hero's Will, Overlord's Way
heading: EP 11
description: null_s

name: The Final Battle 1
heading: EP 12 Part I
description: null_s

name: The Final Battle 2
heading: EP 12 Part II
description: null_s

name: At the end of battle...
heading: Final Episode
description: null_s

heading: EP 1
description: null_s

name: Demon General
heading: EP 2
description: null_s

name: His Name is Zeroken
heading: EP 3
description: null_s

name: Yellow, Rabbits, and Curry
heading: EP 4

name: The One Who Controls Death
heading: EP 5

heading: EP 6
description: null_s

name: Past Struggles Part 1
heading: EP 7
description: null_s

name: Past Struggles Part 2
heading: EP 8
description: null_s

name: The New Power
heading: EP 9
description: null_s

name: The Memorable Special Sweet Curry
heading: EP 10
description: null_s

name: Netherworld Extinction
heading: EP 11
description: null_s

name: Unbridled Killia
heading: EP 12
description: null_s

name: The Two Killias
heading: EP 13

name: Seraphina's Secret
heading: EP 14
description: null_s

name: The Ultimate Skill
heading: EP 15
description: null_s

name: Dedicated to the Precious People
heading: Final Episode
description: null_s

name: Investigation Start!
heading: null_s
description:
Gordon, the Defender of Earth, arrives in the Netherworld to 
investigate the disappearance of Prinnies! 
What awaits him is...

name: Search for the Hero!
heading: null_s

name: Enemies Emerge!
heading: null_s
description:
Demons stand in the way 
of the search for Almaz! 
And the person controlling them is...

name: Almaz is the Overlord!?
heading: null_s
description:
The true mastermind is 
Almaz, whom they've been 
searching for?

name: Strategic Retreat!
heading: null_s
description:
Defeated by Almaz, the party has to fight through 
their demonic pursuers 
in order to retreat.

name: Information Gathering!
heading: null_s
description:
The party starts to 
gather information about 
the hero title in order to 
deal with the demon title.

name: Another Hero!
heading: null_s
description:
Knowing the weaknesses 
of the demon title, the party decides to 
find the hero title.

name: Almaz's Title!
heading: null_s
description:
Don Joaquin entrusts the title of hero 
to the party 
who have overcome the trial.

name: Almaz Once More!
heading: null_s
description:
The party confronts Almaz again 
with the hero title, only to find that 
Almaz's title has been upgraded to "Knock-off Overlord"!

name: Showdown with the Great Overlord!
heading: null_s
description:
The demon title that escaped from Almaz 
has materialized! 
Thus becoming Prinny 
the Great Overlord!

name: Follow your feelings
heading: null_s
description: Maybe it's because of the Santa costume, but Usalia and the Mage sense a mysterious presence. What will it reveal to them?

name: Knew it Was You
heading: null_s
description:
Prinnies bearing gifts were seen by Laharl and the others. 
Could they be the masterminds behind all this?

name: Evil Academy's Holy Night
heading: null_s
description: The Evil Academy on Christmas Eve. Cheer and goodwill are cut short for Laharl and his friends as they encounter a Delinquent Teacher.

name: Miser's Collection
heading: null_s
description:
Usalia and the Mage are worried they won't make it to Christmas on time. 
What would Laharl, as Santa, think about that?

name: Xmas Hater
heading: null_s
description: Christmas is drawing near, but the presents are only halfway ready. Finally, the evil puppeteer reveals himself in front of the anxious Nether Santas!

name: Majin Etna Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Mirror Cake and Prinnies
heading: null_s
description:
Mirror Cake is an indispensable part of 
the traditional festivities in Snow Melody Village. 
However, no one could have foreseen the turmoil.

name: Mirror Cake Lab
heading: null_s
description:
An agonized scream echoed throughout the Netherworld. 
Fubuki, and others, rushed to the scene. 
What they saw was...

name: The Avenger of Traditional Cuisine
heading: null_s
description:
With Mao on board, it should have been easy to 
take back the New Year Food. 
But to everyone's surprise, Mr. You-Know-Who stood in the way.

name: Shinobi's Resolve?
heading: null_s
description:
Fubuki and his friends were making steady progress in reclaiming food. 
But something strange happened to Rozalin.

name: The Place Where It All Began
heading: null_s
description:
The party arrived at Snow Melody Village, where everything had begun. 
The fight against the Mirror Cake Prinny 
had finally come to an end!

name: A Tanuki's Lucky Balls
heading: null_s
description:
In front of the Prinny Kurtis, who was feeling the limits of his power, a Prinny with an old map 
appeared.

name: Bambrooms of Mt. Demon
heading: null_s
description:
In the mountains hides a legendary ingredient 
that has been struggling 
...no, evolving 
since the beginning of time!

name: Staff of Change
heading: null_s
description:
Kurtis is frustrated by his 
constant failures and begins 
searching for the next item 
to shake off his anxiety.

name: Ra's Mirror Cake
heading: null_s
description:
Don't tell me... 
Mirror Cake again.

name: On Being a Hero
heading: null_s
description:
What's the difference? Such harsh words 
cut him deep. 
Suddenly, Mr. You-Know-Who appeared 
in front of a confused Kurtis!?

name: Anniversary Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Modified Prinny Conquest Battle
heading: null_s
description:
The Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: NBP Grand Opening!
heading: null_s
description:
A flyer 
reached Laharl. 
It was the beginning of a nightmare.

name: Demon Cutie Advent
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl and her friends are making their way 
through the intricate NBP venue. 
Just then, a second assassin 
shows up.

name: Beauty Hero
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl forges onward with all her strength 
in order to regain her original form. 
Will her next opponent 
be an easier one?

name: Definition of Beauty
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl is tired from 
a series of perverse battles. 
Hopefully the next opponent 
will be an upstanding one...

name: On True Beauty
heading: null_s
description:
Finally, the finale. 
Girl Laharl vows to 
beat Mid-Boss to win the championship 
and return to her original form.

name: Pure Flonne Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Course on Chaos, Part 1
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl, the legendary graduate. 
Her attempts to inspire new graduates from the Evil Academy 
to follow in her footsteps 
begins now.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 2
heading: null_s
description:
While training with Zeroken, the group attempts to move forward. 
However, a 2nd substitute Delinquent Teacher 
stands in their way.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 3
heading: null_s
description:
The group overcomes the 2nd substitute Delinquent Teacher 
and moves on. 
But for how long 
will their success continue?

name: Course on Chaos, Part 4
heading: null_s
description:
With all modules completed. 
The only thing left is to go back to the academy. 
At least that was the plan...

name: Course on Chaos, Part 5
heading: null_s
description:
Ms. Raspberyl spoke 
to Kyoko and Asuka, who had no idea what they were lacking, even after the brawl.

name: Raid Battle
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Reflection Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Modified Prinny Conquest Battle
heading: null_s
description:
The Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Path of Admiring Sakura
heading: null_s
description:
"Let's go see the sakura!" 
Sicily had no idea of the 
sequence of events that these 
words would set in motion.

name: Magic Cutie Techniques
heading: null_s
description:
Despite Sicily's confusion at suddenly 
transforming into a Magic Cutie, Pure Flonne didn't hesitate to slaughter the enemies. 
But what about the sakura?

name: Salvation of Love
heading: null_s
description:
The group chases after Darktina 
with Pure Sicily in the lead. 
All the while, Pure Sicily keeps practicing her Magic Cutie Techniques.

name: Love's Miracle
heading: null_s
description:
Darktina's blow 
hit Love Oracle 
causing great damage. The fate of Love Oracle... 
what will it be!?

name: On Being a Magic Cutie
heading: null_s
description:
Together with their new companion, Puretina, the party 
goes to the final battle 
to stop Love Oracle.

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: A Challenge from the Prism Rangers!
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Netherworld Cat Cafe
heading: null_s
description:
A cat cafe has opened in the Netherworld! 
Someone unexpected appears 
in front of Etna, who is only there 
for the desserts and has no interest in cats.

name: Partnership
heading: null_s
description:
Virunga, the manager, has regained his composure. 
But why did Virunga open 
a cat cafe in the Netherworld?

name: Association for Feline Rights
heading: null_s
description:
Before everyone knows it, the cats have escaped from the cafe!? 
Where have the cats gone!!

name: A Third Party Emerges!?
heading: null_s
description:
Prinnies suddenly 
rush in. 
Will a three-way battle 
involving the Association for Feline Rights begin?

name: A Bro's True Intentions
heading: null_s
description:
The party takes a break 
after a heated battle with the Sardine Doods, but then they notice something strange.

name: Bloodis Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Fairy, Conquest Version
heading: null_s
description:
The Fairies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Undead, Conquest Version
heading: null_s
description:
The Undead had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Sludge, Conquest Version
heading: null_s
description:
The Sludges had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Sister Artina Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Bread Eating Competition
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship 
to abolish short shorts. 
However, the road to victory 
is not an easy one.

name: Scavenger Hunt
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship 
with the help of Fuka and Ayame. 
But the opponent in the next event 
is not going to be easy to deal with!

name: Three-legged Race
heading: null_s
description:
The fest-evil is entering its long middle stretch. Tiredness begins to show 
on the faces of Raspberyl and the others. 
Then Mr. You-Know-Who appears 
before them.

name: Gymnastic Formation?
heading: null_s
description:
Next up: Gymnastic Formation!
At last, an event other than running. 
Raspberyl and her friends 
should be happy about this...

name: Chicken Fight
heading: null_s
description:
A clear victory!
This startling declaration from Mao 
baffled the clueless Raspberyl 
and her equally clumsy friends.

name: Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None
